description: An archipelago close to the Red Line where the Straw Hats face overwhelming Navy forces.

keyEvents.title: Sentomaru Arrives at Sabaody
keyEvents.description: Sentomaru and Pacifista PX-1 arrive at Sabaody to hunt down the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Escalates the Navy's assault on the pirates at Sabaody.

keyEvents.title: Kizaru Attacks the Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: Admiral Kizaru intercepts and attacks Zoro's group at Sabaody.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming force the World Government brings to bear on Sabaody.
